overview: Nongyao is a fake doctor who do an illegal abortion. She fosters Prakong and her daughter, Tubtim, and give her an assistant position. Run, a son of Nongyao, is a handsome young man who flirts with many girl. He always bring women to have an abortion. Tubtim doubts her mother's profession. To tell the truth that Run is one of the children who mother come to have an abortion but survived and Nongyao decides to adopt him. She has to risk her peaceful life.
title: Love
